Replies.Reply: Kirsty, come to daddy  The tiny silence following PINHEAD's words is shattered by a piercing and terrified scream.
It is not HANDS that call us...
Ah, Kirsty. And we thought we'd lost you.
How can it send us back, child?
Oh, Kirsty; so eager to play, so reluctant to admit it.
But he's in his own Hell, child And quite unreachable.
But it's true, He is his own Hell.
... we have Eternity to know your flesh!
Oh. No Boxes. Such a shame.
No more deals, Kirsty. It's your flesh we want to experience, not your skill at bargaining.
Go on. But trick us again, child, and your suffering will be legendary even in Hell.
What is this? Someone else you think escaped us, like Frank?
Tell you what - we'll make a deal. I'll tell you what I know, then you tell me what you know.  O.K.?
Don't worry. He's O.K.  We sent him home hours ago.  Jeez, what a story.
What was it, kid? Smack? Angel dust?
Ronson.  Homicide.  I'm this district's slash and dash expert.
We got two missing people and a house full of corpses.
Oh, pardon me. I obviously didn't convey my hesitation to take his story at face-value. No, YOU talk to me. But - do me a favor? -
What the hell are you asking me for?  Tag it.  Move it.
Easy, easy.  Whatever happened, whatever you saw, it's not here now.
Mmmm.  O.K.  Frankly, I think she's more your territory than mine.  Shame.
Kirsty.  Doctor Malahide's going to look after you now.  Maybe we could talk some more tomorrow.
What are you talking about?  Who are you?
I thought Steve had talked to you?
It's true. All of it. It's all true.
I saw it...him.  But I got away.
Wait!  The mattress.  You've got to destroy it.  She DIED on it, you see.  The mattress.  It's haunted now.  She can come back...
The cop. He didn't believe me.
I'm sorry, Kirsty. Kyle will come back with something to help you sleep. We shall speak tomorrow.
Hey, good joke, Kyle. Do you always come on to the mentally ill?
Jesus, I'm glad I'm not paying for this place.
Oh, Jesus. I can't explain. It's ...it's. I don't know how to help! I have to save him and I don't know how to help!
I know. No-one can. But I have to save him. Where's the other doctor? He said He'd listen. He promised.
Help. No, no-one can help. I just want someone to listen or I WILL go crazy.
Yeah? He got a ticket to Hell?
It must have been going on forever...
But the part I know about, That must have started with my Uncle Frank...
Shit, Kyle. This is getting to be a habit. What is it, some kind of shock-therapy?
As much as that bed of nails allowed.
Oh yeah? On your own a lot, Huh?
You thought I was crazy, didn't you?
And you're sure it was a woman?
Don't worry about it. Your attitude sucks anyway.
What can I do? How can I save him?
The box. I need the box.
You DIDN'T tell me. Do you mean Malahide's got...
I don't know, Kyle. You're the fucking expert. Now get out of the way!
Because I'm going to get my father!
I'm going to get my father.
Kyle! No! I'll kill you, you...
What, you mean you're something more than a whore with a vicious streak?
Hey, remember me? From the hospital? I was in the next room?
You don't want to go down there. You REALLY don't want to go down there.
Tiffany! Don't trust it! Don't Trust it!
No! You... You can't! It wasn't me...I didn't do it! I didn't open the box!
But I didn't open it! I didn't!
Do you see? You were RIGHT.
Tiffany. Wait here. If I'm not back real soon - get out. Get home.
I should have known! I should've known he wouldn't be here! This place is only for filth like you!
No! He SHOULDN'T be here! It SHOULD'VE been a trick!
You're full of shit, Frank Cotton.
He loved me, you bastard! He Loved me, he loved my mother.
Daddy! Daddy! I love you! Help me!
For God's sake! He KILLED you!
Tiffany, listen.  You've solved it. But we've got to solve it the OTHER way.  See?  See?
No. Come on. We have to get out of here.
These flowers. I saw them just...
What do you do? I just don't know what to do.
Is he going to be all right?
No. He's not going to be all right.
Oh, Jesus. I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I didn't mean it.
Oh, Christ. This isn't just personal anymore.
No, No, this one didn't escape.
It's you! You HAVEN'T always been as you are. You were HUMAN. Remember. Remember all your confusions. Think!
What are you doing? What are WE doing?
No. Don't let it. You've come this far.
So. What're you going to do?
Kucich here,sir.  We just found another one, though it suffered a little...

We can bring them back properly more often than scientific orthodoxy dictates, ladies and gentlemen.  And the knife, far from the enemy of of analysis, is often its greatest ally in solving the puzzles of psychosis. Analysis isolates and massages. Surgery pinpoints and corrects. ... though you've got to know what you're doing, of course...
Some things are obvious. Here, for example, ...
...are the optical motor nerve control centers.
Now. This case. A deeply-buried psychosis severe enough to produce frighteningly frequent hysteria and aggression. Incurable. Say others. Not so.
And then, ladies and gentlemen, we REBUILD. With all the care and knowledge that our years of training have given us ...
My part in this is over.  You may tidy up for me.  Kyle, you come with me.
Sorry.  Must get that door fixed.  Detective Ronson?
My assistant, Kyle Macrae.  And this must be Kirsty?
Detective. I'll be able to help this girl. But I need your assistance ...
I suspect not. But that doesn't necessarily mean you're wrong, does it?
And how are we feeling today...?
Officer Kucich? Yes, Doctor Malahide. You've spoken to Ronson? Yes ... That's right.
Then let us speak of it ...
It's what I've ALWAYS wanted. A view of ...
You were almost enough, Julia but...I have to see. I have to KNOW.
Enough. God, that's enough. We HAVE to go back.
Tiffany. Come. I have a whole new world of puzzles for you to enjoy ...
A whole new world of pleasures for you to endure.
Ah, girls. And how are we feeling today?
You have your whole lives behind you now.
Dr. Malahide, the new arrival is awake, and appears very distressed.
Nearly a doctor. I'm Kyle Macrae. Call me Kyle.
Oh, Jesus, I'm sorry. God, if anyone should know not to do that, it's me. I'm sorry. O.K.?
Sad, huh? She's been here six months. Her name's TIFFANY.
Almost complete withdrawal. She hasn't said a word for nearly two years.
Yeah. Doctor Malahide's got her doing these jig-saws and things, though. Says it's helping to bring her out.
Anyway, let's concentrate on you for a moment. Wanna suck on this for me?
Shit. Sorry. Here's the pills. Red face. Door. Bye.
Kirsty, I'm sorry...  don't understand. I...
Dr. Malahide. Yes. Look, I'll fetch him. You take it easy.
If anyone can help, HE can.
Well, the sofa isn't often used for sleeping on...
I think I need to talk. About what I saw.
Jesus, yes! What do you expect.
God, I wish I could say no.
Hey, so for it. Don't let pity stop you. I'm down. Nail me.
The box? Like in your story?
The Boxes. In the House. I told you.
Yeah. The things you were talking about.
Wait a minute. What do you mean, 'I'm going?' TO the HOUSE?
I KNOW I don't have to. It's just my time of the month to be a complete fucking idiot. O.K.?
Sorry, Dr. Malahide. But it's Tiffany. She's escaped ... again.
Wait out here. A doctor will talk to you when we know more.
Get them off me. Get them off me.
Get them off me. Get. Them.
Don't be embarrassed. You're my friend.
Now all we need is a skin.
Sssh. I think it's still here.
Yes. I had to stop you going in there because I knew you'd cry out. Any normal person would.
Was I right? Is it terrible?
Oh. You look awful.  You poor boy. Come here...
Kirsty! How nice of you to drop in.
You have surprisingly good taste in men.
Oh, you can try it, you little bitch. I'd love you to try it. But I'm not just the woman I was.
I mean I'm something more than human, you little shit!
Oh, Kirsty. They didn't tell you, did they? I'm afraid they've changed the rules of the fairy tale; I'm no longer just the wicked step-mother.
So come on; Take your best shot, Snow White.
You're sure this is what you want?
Come. I have such sights to show you.
Go back? What an earth makes you think we can go back?
Sorry, friend. No day trips to Hell. Here you are. Here you stay. And forward the only way to go.
But you WANTED this. You wanted to SEE. You wanted to KNOW. And here it is. The heart of Hell.
Why do you think I was allowed to go back? For YOU? No, it wanted souls. And I brought you.
Well, well. All my family together again. How very sweet.
Do you really need to ask?
Oh, poor Larry.  You never could hold on to anything for very long, could you?
I'm a girl who keeps her promises.
So sweet of you to come back.
Didn't open the box. And what was it last time? Didn't know what the box was. And yet we DO keep finding each other, don't we?
Perhaps you're teasing us. Are you teasing us?
No more delays, Kirsty. No more teasing. Time to play.
No. Over here. Behind the screen.
That's it, baby. Come to Daddy.
Oh, right. Daddy's died and gone to heaven, eh?
Shit. Bull. Shit  FRANK pauses and smiles. Then he begins to move more fully into the room, shifting his weight as he does so and dragging what was hidden into the light. KIRSTY screams again.
See? He's here. You should learn to believe your Uncle Frank.
Don't waste your tears. Look at him!
Ah, Julia. She hasn't been to see me recently. That's why it's so nice to have you here, baby. Daddy's little girl.
Now don't be naughty, Kirsty. Or I'll have to punish you first.
Yes. Stay there. I'll be with you in a minute.
Yes. You're a girl who remembers her promises.
And I know how much I mean to you. Come here.
Come here. Kiss me. And then...
... we'll have a real family re-union.
Of course I am. She BELONGS to me.
She's forgiven me that. Haven't you?
Get your fucking hands off my daughter, you bastard!
Stay there, baby. Don't come in.
Jesus Christ, FRANK. I don't believe you. You don't know her at all do you? You still think you're in charge.
Wait a minute.  Why are we following her? Who is this?
No.  I've had enough of this shit.
Fuck you and the horse you rode in on.
O.K.  You've done it before.  You can do it again.  GET US OUT OF HERE!
I have to go back. Or it'll never stop.
I can't do it here. I have to go to it.
So whose was all this shit?
